tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had my front tooth crown done with Denta Uno Dental. Was very worried at the beginning but Very friendly Doctors and they knew my problems after going over the situation and full details. Suggested detailed solution after through analysis and possible solutions with the type of crown suitable for my situation. Got my temporary tooth done in 2 days and final crown after 3 days. Crown looks good and feel very comfortable just like my own tooth.
Will definitely recommend my friends and family in longer run and will come again for any future ailments regarding tooth.

Thank you for all the support

review: I recently had the pleasure of visiting Denta Uno Dental, and I can confidently say that it was the best dental experience I've ever had. During my examination, Dr. Sushma and Dr Umesh took the time to listen to my concerns and answer all of my questions patiently. They demonstrated an exceptional level of knowledge and skill, explaining each step of the procedure in a way that made me feel comfortable and informed. Their gentle approach and ability to alleviate any anxiety I had was truly commendable. Really appreciate their work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My treatment is completely painless, before coming to Dr Umesh my heart was beating 1000 times. Once he started i even not felt the way he used the local Anaesthesia. I didn't realise when he finished the local Anaesthesia and then started the digging root canal treatment. I was amazing, I was enjoying treatment till the end and kept busy talking to me very friendly way.
I am 100% happy now with the treatment and also Dr Umesh educated me to how avoid this in future.
It's value for money treatment plus 100% painless in two visits.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Highly recommended.

When I came here a month ago, I had issues in 4 of my teeth with one tooth hurting even after root canal was done on it. The doctor identified solutions to all problems and told me how we could go about it.

This included repairing existing teeth as well as adding new crowns. Over the course of next 2 weeks, the work was done wonderfully.

Today there is no pain and the new crowns fit perfectly.

I am very happy. Thanks to doctor Umesh and his wife (also doctor) for helping out.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor Explained the issue  clearly.  Good  and hygienic treatment from an experienced/specialist doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I, aged 66, hail from Nepal, my son doing job in Bangalore. I had multiple dental problem viz cavity in last molar tooth, fixing implant in place of broken molar tooth, pain in multiple molars. I visited many dentists in Bangalore in JP Nagar and got varying treatment plan and very high financial cost. But I feel lucky to be referred to Dr Umesh and it was an amazing experience In undergoing treatment under him. RCT, extraction of last molar tooth,  correcting old  caps and putting new crown,all of these procedures were done  without any pain and complications. He is very friendly, polite and explains problems in details. Also the most important thing is that he never advised me to go to unwanted procedures thereby saving me a lot of money. His clinic UNo Dento too is very aesthetic and absolutely organised.
Post treatment I feel fine wrt my dental problems. 
Thanks to Dr Umesh and his assistant Vijaylaxmi, who is also very polite and efficient.
reply_text: Thank you so much...your kind words keep me motivated...Take care

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
** ** * **** **** ****** **** ************ *** ******* ** ******** *** ****** ********,He Explained  with patience of all pros and cons of treatment and he was extremely friendly with kind-hearted.Apartfrom this the clinic is well equipped and hygienically maintained.I feel Doctor has taken atmost care during the procedure and post procedure.
He is available over phone also for any problem to the patients which is very unique in Dental Clinics.
I had taken treatment for severe pain in Broken teeth and I received a good treatment.
C.K.N.Prasad.Advocate.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Fillings,Dental Surgery,Gap Closing,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review:
I met Dr Umesh with my multiple chronic dental issues . I found the Dr very friendly , very helpful and instilling lot of confidence needed for a senior citizen . He gave me a perfect treatment plan . Proceedures  like filling , removal of old bridges ,fixation of crowns and removal of one damaged tooth from the upper jaw was done with utmost care and attention . The entire issues were very comfortably sorted out in 2 sittings . I am glad that I am feeling very happy and normal after the treatment . I appreciate the Dr for the good work done to senior citizen like me . 

H MA KHAN
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words sir

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I lost one tooth due to decaying and consulted Dr. Umesh. He explained me all the treatment options like temporary fix and permanent implants. I went ahead with dental implants, although the complete process took more than 6 months and multiple visits but the process was smooth. The doctor explained every procedure in detail and it was almost painless. The implanted tooth looks similar to the natural one and the final result has come out very well. Thanks to Dr Umesh .

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I very rarely leave reviews, however, this is onw that is most deserving of one!
I saw Dr. Umesh and his team for some dental work this morning and this was by far the best experience I have had at a dentist despite how much work was needed to be done.
Dr Umesh is very personable and professional. He explains everything clearly, and gives you options, as well as educated explanations of each. He is also very compassionate. You can tell he really cares for his patients and how they are feeling during the entire procedure.
Right from the moment I walked into the clinic, everyone that I interacted with was amazing.
I will definitely be coming back, and referring everyone I know to this place!

review: It was an Amazing experience with Dr. Umesh and Dr.Sushma Umesh, I stayed in USA and had come back couple of months ago, I had a filling done in USA which had come out and I had unbearable shooting pain, Dr. Suspected root canal and immediately I booked an appointment and I had just 2 sitting with Dr. Umesh out of which the Root canal got little complicated due the curved roots, he explained every bit of it and corrected the curved roots and everything was brought to normal and till date I have no issues, and I had a broken front tooth which was not corrected for ages and Dr.Sushma filled the tooth to the exact replica in the same sitting, I am very glad and happy, till date I have no issues, one last thing I would like to say patience, perfection and education it‚Äôs a combined effort!
